# Jon Gerton Web Development

Jon Gerton offers professional web development services specializing in WordPress sites and custom web applications. Aimed at local businesses and organizations, the website serves as a platform for potential clients to learn about his services, view pricing, and reach out for projects. With a focus on quick turnarounds and personalized support, the site highlights the value of professional online presence for business growth.

## Home

This section outlines the primary offerings and value propositions of Jon Gerton Web Development. It emphasizes:
- **Fast, Professional WordPress Sites** at $500, designed to be live within 5 business days.
- **Custom Web Applications** tailored to unique business needs.
- **Team Growth Mentoring** to help developers enhance their skills.

### Links
- [Get Your Business Online](/services)
- [See My Work](/projects)

## Services

The services page presents transparent pricing and highlights various offerings, including:
### $500 WordPress Sites
- Professional and mobile-friendly sites delivered in 5 days.
- Basic SEO, contact forms, and ongoing support included.

### Custom Web Applications
- Tailored solutions with modern technology (React, Node).
- Pricing based on project scope.

### Team Growth Accelerator
- Mentorship for developers including code review and architecture guidance.

### FAQ
Common questions regarding project timelines, pricing, and hosting requirements are addressed, providing clarity on what clients can expect.

## About

This page details Jon Gerton's work philosophy and process. It describes a straightforward four-step method, from discovery calls to ongoing support after project launch. Key highlights include:
- A focus on clear communication without technical jargon.
- Fixed pricing with no hidden fees.
- 18+ years of experience in web development.

### Links
- [Get Your Business Online](/services)
- [View My Work](/projects)

## Contact

Visitors can get in touch to discuss projects or schedule a discovery call. Key options include:
- Sending a message via a contact form.
- Scheduling a 15-minute call for quick inquiries.

### Links
- Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
- GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
- LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## Thank You Page

This page confirms receipt of messages sent through the contact form. It outlines the next steps that will be taken, including reviewing project details and potentially scheduling calls for deeper discussions.
